issue.title: [C++] Persist CMake options in generated CMake config
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4841](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4841). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
(do this after we merged the CMake refactor)

 

We should persist all options set during the CMake run also in `arrowConfig.cmake` so that CMake projects that depend on Arrow also can determine what they are able to provide.
